Question
========
  
Below are two statements:

I By using an objective, predetermined probability of rejecting H0, hypothesis testing is a form of inductive behavior. II Testing H0 according to Neyman and Pearson principles, encourages poor theory building.

Which theorem(s) is/are TRUE?

  
Answerlist
----------
* Both Theorem I and Theorem II are TRUE.
* Theorem I is TRUE, Theorem II is false.
* Theorem II is true, Theorem I is false.
* Both propositions are TRUE.
